remarks: Multiplication of a vector by a negated scalar.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lmodvsinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvsinv.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvsinv.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvsinv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` W ) $.
lmodvsinv.m $e |- M = ( invg ` F ) $.
lmodvsinv.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmodvsinv $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( M ` R ) .x. X ) = ( N ` ( R .x. X ) ) ) $.
